source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_00<tab>Alka Zolka has news which should be of great interest to you.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_00<tab>斧術士ギルドのアルカ・ゾルカは、冒険者に朗報を聞かせたいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_01<tab>Alka Zolka has come into possession of ancient engravings which purport to show the traditional raiments of Nymian scholars. Coupled with information gleaned from other sources, he believes he has deduced the raiments' design. However, he wishes to conclusively verify their historical accuracy by recreating the garments and gauging your faerie's reaction. In order to do so, he will need to enlist the aid of a preeminent Eorzean weaver─namely, Master Redolent Rose of Sunsilk Tapestries. Approaching him now would be premature, though, as you must first gather the leaves of a direwort. These plants, which can be found only in the Fogfens of Mor Dhona, are essential for producing the distinct colors of a Nymian scholar's uniform.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_01<tab>アルカ・ゾルカの依頼を受けた。モードゥナの迷霧湿原の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DD101 /var>」を調べよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_02<tab>Your initial attempt to gather the direwort leaves is foiled by the sudden appearance of belligerent wildlife, which you are forced to dispatch. Hopefully, your second attempt will not be so rudely interrupted.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DD101 /var>を調べ、現れた魔物を討伐した。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DD101 /var>」を調べて「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_03<tab>To your relief, no rampaging beast attempts to devour you this time. Journey to Ul'dah and speak with Redolent Rose, who should have hopefully been contacted by Alka Zolka by now.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>を入手した。ウルダハの裁縫師ギルドにいる「レドレント･ローズ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874801 /var>」を渡し、「学者の装束」を受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_04<tab>Redolent Rose works feverishly to render the ancient designs into modern creations. Alas, his skill is insufficient to produce more than the culottes; the other pieces will require the skills of a master goldsmith and leatherworker. Realizing that you were not aware of this fact, Redolent Rose offers to contact Mistresses Serendipity and Geva of the Goldsmiths' and Leatherworkers' Guilds on your behalf, so that you need only visit each guild and present the items to receive their help.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_04<tab>レドレント･ローズに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>と<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874801 /var>を渡し「学者の装束」を受け取った。ウルダハの彫金師ギルドにいる「セレンディピティー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>」を渡し、「学者の装束」を受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_05<tab>The ever-cheerful Serendipity requires but a moment to fashion a mythril tassel for your mortarboard. You can only hope that Geva will work with similar alacrity.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_05<tab>セレンディピティーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>を渡し「学者の装束」を受け取った。グリダニアの革細工師ギルドにいる「ゲヴァ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>」を渡し、「学者の装束」を受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_06<tab>Geva effortlessly crafts a pair of fingerless gloves in accordance with Alka Zolka's designs. However, she has no intention of spoiling you further, and bids you speak with Beli, her subordinate, about the boots.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_06<tab>ゲヴァに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>を渡し「学者の装束」を受け取った。グリダニアの革細工師ギルドにいる「ベリ」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>」を渡し、「学者の装束」を受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_07<tab>Beli relishes the opportunity to finish the famed Redolent Rose's work, wasting no time in constructing the leather boots. Now that the set is complete, all that remains is to show Alka Zolka what the craftsmen have wrought.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_07<tab>ベリに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>を渡し「学者の装束」を受け取った。学者の装備をして、リムサ・ロミンサの斧術士ギルドにいる「アルカ・ゾルカ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_08<tab>Alka Zolka is thrilled by the resemblance you bear to the Nymian scholars of eld. He is not alone in his excitement, as your faerie also appears to approve of your new raiments. Wear them with pride as you continue to pursue your studies.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SEQ_08<tab>アルカ・ゾルカに報告した。彼は冒険者の集めた装束を見て、ご満悦のようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_00<tab>Search for a direwort shrub in Mor Dhona.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_00<tab>迷霧湿原の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DD101 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_01<tab>Harvest leaves from the direwort shrub.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DD101 /var>を調べ、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the leaves and thesis to Redolent Rose in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_02<tab>裁縫師ギルドのレドレント･ローズに指定の品を渡して
学者の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_03<tab>Ask Serendipity to finish Redolent Rose's work.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_03<tab>セレンディピティーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>を渡し、学者の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_04<tab>Ask Geva in Gridania to finish Redolent Rose's work.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_04<tab>革細工師ギルドのゲヴァに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>を渡し、学者の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_05<tab>Ask Beli to finish Redolent Rose's work.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_05<tab>ベリに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>を渡し、学者の装束を入手

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Alka Zolka at the Marauders' Guild.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_TODO_06<tab>学者の装備をしてアルカ・ゾルカに報告

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_000<tab>Good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have made yet another discovery which pertains to you and your scholarly arts.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_000<tab>やあやあ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>君！
相棒のフェアリーともども、腕を上げたようだね！
こっちの調査にも進展があったよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_001<tab>I have come into possession of several ancient engravings, including some which show the traditional raiments of Nymian scholars.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_001<tab>第五星暦当時の「学者」が活躍する様子を描いたレリーフと、
その装束にまつわる記述を発見したんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_002<tab>In fact, the extraordinary detail of these illustrations, coupled with information gleaned from other sources, was sufficient to deduce their design.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_002<tab>もし、学者の装束を再現できたとしたら……
フェアリーの記憶も、おおいに刺激されるんじゃないかな？

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab>At present, it is impossible to say how historically accurate my designs are. That is why I propose we enlist the aid of Eorzea's preeminent artisans, so that we might recreate these garments. Should they prove sufficiently authentic, I expect your faerie will regain more of her missing memories.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_003<tab>とはいえ、1500年以上前の装束を、
少ない資料を頼りに作るのは、並の職人じゃムリだろう。
だから、専門家に協力を要請してみたんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>In the hands of a preeminent weaver─say, Master Redolent Rose of Sunsilk Tapestries─this information should be sufficient.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_004<tab>まずは、僕がまとめた「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874801 /var>」を渡しておくよ。
これをウルダハにある裁縫師ギルドのマスター、
「レドレント・ローズ」さんに渡して、製作を依頼してくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_005<tab>Ah, but you cannot journey to Ul'dah until you have gathered the leaves of a direwort. My texts explicitly mention that the plant's pigments were used to dye Nymian uniforms.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_005<tab>ただし、その前にやるべきことがある。
材料となる「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>」を手に入れる必要があるのさ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_006<tab>Alas, direwort is much rarer than it was in the days of yore. It can only be found in the Fogfens now.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_006<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>」は、今やモードゥナの
「迷霧湿原」でしか見られない稀少な妖花の若葉だ。
密集した樹木の間を、よく探してくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>Lest you think I mean to make you do all the work, worry not. While you scour Mor Dhona for the plant, I will contact Master Rose and convince him to help─though I doubt it will require much effort!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_007<tab>若葉を手に入れたら「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874801 /var>」ともども、
裁縫師ギルドの「レドレント・ローズ」さんに渡すんだ。
「学者の装束」の再現、楽しみに待っているよ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_010<tab>Do not forget to obtain the direwort leaves before journeying to Ul'dah! Without them, it will be impossible to reproduce the distinct colors of a Nymian scholar's uniform.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_010<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>」を手に入れたら「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874801 /var>」ともども、
裁縫師ギルドの「レドレント・ローズ」さんに渡すんだ。
「学者の装束」の再現、楽しみに待っているよ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_020<tab>...I suppose you <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> have a rather scholarly air about you. I've been expecting you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have you the leaves and Alka Zolka's designs, then?
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_020<tab>あなたが、アルカ・ゾルカちゃんが言ってた「学者」さん？
ヒトは見かけによらないのねぇ……。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_021<tab>Crafting raiments that have not been seen in fifteen hundred years... This is indeed a daunting challenge.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_021<tab>この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874801 /var>」に描かれてる写し絵を参考に、
装束を再現すればいいのね？

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_022<tab>But it is one I suspect I will enjoy a great deal, for rare is the day a weaver revives ancient fashion!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_022<tab>なるほど……仕立てるのは難しそうだけど、
こんな感じの復古主義的オシャレもいいわね。
古代のロマンをビンビン感じるわ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_023<tab>I shall begin at once. You may observe if you like, but be aware it will be a lengthy process...
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_023<tab>この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E874901 /var>」を染料に、
シックな濃紺に染めるっていうのも素敵よね！
さっそく作業に取りかからせてもらうわ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_024<tab>It...it has been some time since I labored with such...intensity.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_024<tab>はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……
で、できたわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_025<tab>I adhered to Alka Zolka's designs as best I could, though there were certain aspects I felt compelled to change. His lack of familiarity with textiles and weaving led to what I can only assume are errors.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_025<tab>私ったら、ガラにもなくハッスルしちゃったわ！
そのぶんだけ、満足のいくデキに仕上がってるわよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_026<tab>You will note that I could only complete the culottes. This is because the other garments require skills which I do not possess.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_026<tab>ただ、注意してほしいことがあるの。
完成したのは脚衣だけ……あとは未完成よ。
仕上げは、それぞれの専門家に任せたいの。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_027<tab>Mistresses Serendipity and Geva of the Goldsmiths' and Leatherworkers' Guilds, respectively, can provide the finishing touches to the remaining pieces.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_027<tab>制帽は、彫金師ギルドの「セレンディピティー」ちゃん。
手袋は、革細工師ギルドの「ゲヴァ」ちゃん。
ブーツは、同じく革細工師ギルドの「ベリ」ちゃんよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_028<tab>Ah, but you were unaware that I could not craft the full set by myself, weren't you?
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_028<tab>それぞれの専門家に、私が用意した
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>」を渡せば仕上げてくれるわ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_029<tab>Very well. I shall send word to them on your behalf, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You will need only visit each guild and present to them my unfinished work.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_029<tab>全部完成したら、
「アルカ・ゾルカ」ちゃんに着て見せてあげなさいよ。
あの子も装束の完成を楽しみにしてるはずだからね。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_040<tab>You may wear the culottes at your leisure, but the boots, gloves, and mortarboard remain unfinished.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_040<tab>仕上げは、それぞれの専門家に任せたいの。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_041<tab>Only a master goldsmith and leatherworker have the skill to complete the three remaining pieces.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_041<tab>制帽は、彫金師ギルドの「セレンディピティー」ちゃん。
手袋は、革細工師ギルドの「ゲヴァ」ちゃん。
ブーツは、同じく革細工師ギルドの「ベリ」ちゃんよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_042<tab>So, if you wish to finish what you have started, then make haste for the Goldsmiths' and Leatherworkers' Guilds.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_042<tab>それぞれの専門家に、私が用意した
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E884401 /var>」を渡せば仕上げてくれるわ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_043<tab>I will see that the two guildmasters know to expect you.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_043<tab>全部完成したら、
「アルカ・ゾルカ」ちゃんに着て見せてあげなさいよ。
あの子も装束の完成を楽しみにしてるはずだからね。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_050<tab>Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Red said you'd be along shortly. So, let's see that mortarboard!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_050<tab>はい、どうもこんにちは！
あなたがレドレント・ローズさんの言っていた
「学者」さんですね？

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_051<tab>Hmmm... This shouldn't take long. Wait here a moment.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_051<tab>話は伺っていますよ。
さっそくですが、仕上げ作業をやってみますね。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_052<tab>Here it is, as promised. Amazing what a difference a mythril tassel can make, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_052<tab>できました！
レドレント・ローズさんが仕立てた帽子に、
ミスリル細工の留め金と飾りをちりばめてみました。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_053<tab>Wear it with pride, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Now, off you go! And be sure to enjoy your time in Gridania!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_053<tab>深い濃紺に、ミスリルの白い輝き！
うん、とっても素敵だと思いますっ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_060<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who would single-handedly revive the scholarly arts. All right, then, show me what you've got.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_060<tab>ふぅん、レドレント・ローズが言っていた
自称「学者」って、あんたなのね。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_061<tab>Master Rose's work is marvelous, as to be expected. This will be a pleasure.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_061<tab>ま、いいわ。
細かい話は抜きにして、仕上げ作業に入るから。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_062<tab>There you go─one pair of fingerless buffalo leather gloves, perfect for the scholar who prefers that <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> protection does not come at a cost to dexterity.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_062<tab>こんなものかしら？
リムサ・ロミンサから取り寄せておいた
バッファロー革を縫いあわせたグローブよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_063<tab>Oh, the boots? Beli will see to those. He's an expert cordwainer, so you needn't worry about the quality. Besides, I've already spoiled you by making your gloves for free.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_063<tab>魔道書をめくりやすいように、
指先が出る形に仕上げておいたわ……大切になさい。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_000_070<tab>You're the scholar, yes? I've been instructed to assist you. If you would please let me see Master Rose's work...
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_000_070<tab>例の「学者の装束」に関する依頼だね？
靴職人である、この私の腕が必要というのなら、
喜んで手を貸させてもらおう。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_100_070<tab>This craftsmanship is amazing! I cannot wait to get started.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_100_070<tab>こんな機会は、なかなかないからね。
気合いを入れて、仕事をするとしようか！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_000_071<tab>Here you are, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Made with the finest boar and buffalo leather, in accordance with Alka Zolka's designs─which are <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> impressive, I must say.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_000_071<tab>ほら、お望みの品の完成だ。
写し絵のデザインを参考に、キミが届けてくれた部品に、
バッファロー革とボア革を縫いあわせて仕上げてみた。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_000_072<tab>He must be dying to see the completed set. I know I would be, had I gone to such great lengths. You ought to surprise him by wearing the garments when next you meet him.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_000_072<tab>多くの命をいただいて作った品なんだ。
くれぐれも、愛情をもって使ってくれよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_079<tab>...Should a chirurgeon humor the imbecile who sticks his hand in a fire just to see what will happen? You are a fool, and you know it. Fortunately for you, so did I, which is why I prepared another pair of culottes for this eventuality.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_REDOLENTROSE_000_079<tab>やだぁ、「学者の装束」を失くしちゃったの！？
おっちょこちょいね……いいわ、特別にもう一度あげる。
貴重なんだから、今度こそ失くさないように気をつけてね！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_079<tab>Wow, you really are as foolish as Red said! He came by earlier and gave me additional mortarboards, saying that you'd probably come back and ask for another.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_SERENDIPITY_000_079<tab>わぁー、「学者の装束」を失くしちゃったんですか！？
そんな……でも、そういう不幸なこともありますよね……。
では、特別にもうひとつ差し上げます！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_079<tab>I don't know what's more impressive: Master Rose's prescience, or your idiocy. Be thankful I don't skin you for this.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_GEVA_000_079<tab>なんだって、「学者の装束」を失くしちまったのかい！？
大切にしろって言っただろうに……
特別にもう一度あげるけど、今度こそ失くさないでおくれよ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_100_079<tab>Matron's teats! Why would you go and do a foolish thing like that? I mean, really, that's just...damn. You should count your blessings that Master Rose leaves nothing to chance.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_BELI_100_079<tab>「学者の装束」を失くしたって！？
しっかりしてくれよ……特別にもうひとつあげるけど、
大切な品なんだから、くれぐれも大切に扱ってくれよ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_079<tab>...Although I am certain this is not necessary, on the off chance you <var 1A 02 /var>misplaced<var 1A 01 /var> any pieces of the set, go back and speak with the artisans. If we are fortunate, they may be able to furnish us with replacements.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_079<tab>「学者の装束」を、はやく着て見せてくれよ……
もしも「学者の装束」が手元に見当たらないようなら、
もう一度、各ギルドマスターを訪ねてみてくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! By your return I take it the raiments are ready? If so, would you consider donning them so I might see if they match the ancient descriptions?
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_080<tab>も、もしかして、「学者の装束」が完成したのかい？

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_090<tab>By the gods, I feel as though I have been transported backwards through time!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_090<tab>こ、これが……
「ニーム海兵団」の学者が着ていた、古の制式装束ッ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_091<tab>You are the very image of the Nymian scholars of eld!
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_091<tab>素晴らしい出来だよ！
石版に刻まれたレリーフから、
こんなにすばらしい装束が再現されるなんて！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_092<tab>Well, minus the gown, but still! Never in my wildest dreams did I think it would turn out this well.
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_092<tab>自分で提案しておいてなんだけど、本当に驚きだ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_093<tab>Hah, I see you approve as well, little one! Suffice it to say, we can consider this a great success.
target:
TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_ALKAZOLKA_000_093<tab>あはは、キミの相棒も、
どうやらお気に召したようだぞ！
今回の装束再現は大成功だなッ！

source: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_POP_MESSAGE<tab>A foul stench fills your nostrils...
target: TEXT_JOBSCH450_01100_POP_MESSAGE<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！
